description:
@shelbyrana hair growth serum #fyp #fypシ #relatable #hair #haircare  oh my angel -    
Description


HAIR GROWTH & HAIR LOSS PREVENTION – Clinically tested to reactivate dormant follicles, reverse thinning, and prevent hair loss for thicker, fuller hair.
PET-SAFE, MINOXIDIL-FREE FORMULA WITH PROVEN INGREDIENTS – Salicylic Acid, Dex-Panthenol, and L-Menthol along with mineral-rich Glacier Water strengthen roots and accelerate hair growth. No parabens, silicones, or harsh chemicals.
NON-GREASY, COOLING SCALP TREATMENT – Fast-absorbing formula that instantly cools down the scalp and soothes the follicles without leaving a greasy residue. Maintains the hair volume without weighing down the roots.
INNOVATIVE TRIPLE ROLLER APPLICATOR FOR MAXIMUM ABSORPTION – A metal-ball massaging applicator delivers the formula directly to the roots, boosting blood flow and ensuring deep penetration, hence better results.
USE DAILY & FOR ALL HAIR AND SCALP TYPES – Perfect for both men and women with any hair or scalp types. Use daily for best results and experience stronger, thicker, and healthier hair over time.
 
How To Use

After shaking the product sufficiently, evenly apply an adequate amount onto the scalp and massage into the skin with fingers for better absorption. It can be used on a daily basis.
Crown of the head: Gently massage along the hair part.
M-shaped hair line: Massage along the hair line.
 
Key Ingredients

Contains salicylic acids, dexpanthenol, and L-menthol to help with alleviating hair loss symptoms.
Contains plant protein extracts, black food extracts, and triple amino acids blend.

description:
Description


Unlock the secret to radiant, healthy hair with the Treecell Recovery Oil Essence. This transformative leave-in treatment is more than just a shine booster; it's a complete hair care solution designed to restore and illuminate your strands from the root to the tip.


Unlike traditional oils, this serum-oil hybrid absorbs instantly, leaving no residue and never weighing down your hair. Formulated without harsh chemicals, parabens, or silicone oil, it leaves your hair feeling healthy and easy to style.


Indulge your hair in deep, luxurious nourishment with a blend of 9 natural oils, including jojoba seed oil, camellia seed oil, and argan kernel oil. These potent ingredients deliver intense hydration, leaving dry, thirsty hair feeling soft, smooth, and revitalized.


Treecell Recovery Oil Essence goes beyond simply moisturizing. Hydrolyzed silk and keratin protein work their magic to rebuild damaged hair, increasing its resilience and reducing breakage. A powerful trio of peptides – Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Copper Tripeptide-1, and Acetyl Hexapeptide-8 – work together to smooth frizz and enhance shine, revealing your hair's natural glossiness.


FUNCTION
- 9 types of blended natural oil turn rough and dry hair into soft, silky hair
- Easy to apply to your hair without stickiness
- Anti-damage care as it strengthens the hair shaft to prevent further damage

Key Ingredient Benefits
- Moisturising & Nourishing: Jojoba Seed Oil, Camellia Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Argan Kernel Oil, Olive Fruit Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Avocado Oil, Borage Seed Oil, Corn Oil

- Hair Strengthening: Hydrolyzed Silk, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Beta-Carotene

- Frizz Control & Shine: Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Copper Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8

 
How To Use

When using on wet hair, apply 1.5 to 2 times more than when using on dry hair to better protect against damage caused by heat.
Tip: Apply on slightly damp hair to help lock-in moisture for very dry ends.

 
Key Ingredients

Cyclopentasiloxane, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Disiloxane, Fragrance, Jojoba Seed Oil, Linalool, Citronellol, Coumarin, Camellia Seed Oil, Macadamia Seed Oil , Argan Kernel Oil, Olive Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil, Avocado Oil, Borage Seed Oil, Corn Oil, Beta-Carotene, Purified Water, Hydrolyzed Silk, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, 1 , 2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Copper Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8

product_name: Pixcell Biom™ Tonic For Hair Density 130ml
description:
Description


PURCELL PIXCELL BIOM™ Tonic for Hair Density is a 130 mL scalp care mist specifically designed to improve scalp health and enhance hair density.
This tonic features patented ingredients and can be applied to both wet and dry scalps after shampooing or styling.
It quickly boosts hair volume, reduces scalp temperature, and alleviates stress related to hair loss, promoting a healthy balance between the scalp and hair.
Certified by German dermatological tests, it is gentle enough for daily use and serves as an ideal solution for scalp care.
 
How To Use

1. Lift the protection cap toward the arrow direction on the top to remove aluminum sealing.
2. Insert one side of the applicator to the inlet and press the other side to combine.
 
Key Ingredients

Purified Water, Glycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Erythritol, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Bifida Ferment Lysate (9,000 ppm), Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate (9,000 ppm), Soybean Germ Extract, Yeast Ferment Filtrate, Yuja Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Leuconostoc/Radish Ferment Filtrate, Dipropylene Glycol, Propanediol, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Isostearate, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Sodium Citrate, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Citric Acid, Laurylpyridinium Chloride, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sparassis Crispa Extract, Beta-Glucan, Ethylhexylglycerin, 4-Terpineol, Tromethamine.

description:
Description
Introducing Damage Therapy Hair Oil: Your Ultimate Hair Repair SolutionTransform your hair from damaged to dazzling with Damage Therapy Hair Oil, a luxurious reparative styling oil meticulously crafted to elevate your hair care routine. Whether your hair is craving shine, strength, or protection, this versatile oil delivers unparalleled results, leaving your locks looking and feeling their best every day.Product BenefitsExperience the full spectrum of hair perfection with Damage Therapy Hair Oil:Shine: Enhance your hair's natural luster for a radiant, glossy finish.Strengthening: Fortify your strands from within, promoting healthier, more resilient hair.UV Protection: Shield your hair from the harmful effects of UV rays, preserving color vibrancy and vitality.Heat Protection: Safeguard your hair against heat styling damage, offering protection of up to 450°F.Frizz Control: Tame unruly frizz and minimize flyaways for smooth, sleek hair.Detangle: Effortlessly glide through knots and tangles, making styling a breeze.Hair Type:Suitable for all hair types, especially damaged locks in need of intensive repair and nourishment.Material Type Free:Enjoy peace of mind knowing that Damage Therapy Hair Oil is free from sulfates, gluten, aluminum, parabens, and formaldehyde, ensuring a clean, gentle formula that nurtures your hair and scalp.Scent:Unscented for a pure, sensory-neutral experience.Suggested Use:Simply turn the bottle upside down and gently tap the index finger on the bottom to dispense a metered drop of this luxurious oil. Incorporate it into your daily styling routine for hair that shines with health and vitality.
 
How To UseApply 5-10 drops of oil onto the hair. Pat gently to aid absorption.

description:
Description

- Water essence hair mist that completes fresh and soft hair with double hydration of moisture and essence. Provides intensive nourishment and softness on damaged hair to realize unrealistic soft hair.
- Creates moisturizing and hydrated coating layer on rough and crumbly hair for smooth hair as if applied with essence. Provides nutrition and moisturizing layer for softer and refreshing feeling of use. The double hydration from protein and moisture layer results in moisturizing and soft hair that never gets dried and static.
- The fine mist spray results in refreshing finish without any lumps. The fragrant micro water essence particles are evenly absorbed in hair for non-sticky fresh softness and delicate aroma.
- The protein and amino acid ingredients provide abundant nutrition to the hair, and the plant-derived golden oil ingredient gives a smooth and shiny glow.
- Completed skin irritation test. This low irritating product can be effortlessly used without any irritation.

How To Use
After shampooing, apply on towel-dried wet hair or dry hair.
Spray frequently to improve messy hair texture.

description:
Description

－ Hair oil provides nourishing and moisturizing care to dry and damaged strands for a healthy and glossy finish.
－ Contains nutrient-rich plant-based oils (such as argania spinosa kernel oil, macadamia ternifolia seed oil and avocado oil) to improve hair health.
－ Enriched with evening primrose oil containing a high percentage of gamma linolenic acid (GLA) to leave a protective film over strands.
－ Lightweight and non-greasy formula easily absorbs into hair and won't weigh hair down.

How To Use
After shampooing and towel-drying hair, apply onto hair especially the ends and damaged strands.

Cyclopentasiloxane, Disiloxane, Dimethicone, Fragrance, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Bixa Orellana Seed Oil, Tocopherol

description:
Description

-Ritual Hair Oil is a plant-based neutral oil that hydrates and softens strands with a fresh finish even without silicone oil.
-Pracaxi Seed Oil and Babassu Oil will protect your hair from external damages including heat from the hair styler's. 
-Moringa Oil, Argan Kernel Oil and Jojoba Oil will promote nourished and moist hair while preventing hair breakage. 
-Sweet Almond Oil, Coconut Oil and Rosehip Oil will also nurture your hair’s elasticity and strength.

Suggested Use

Take an appropriate amount of the oil and gently apply to your hair. Apply more to split ends and severely damaged parts of your hair for better effects.

Ingredients


Isopropyl Myristate(Emollient), Ethylhexyl Palmitate(Plant-derived emollient), Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Fruit Oil, C13-15 Alkane(Plant-derived solvent), Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate(Plant-derived emulsifier), Pentaclethra Macroloba Seed Oil(Pracaxi oil), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil(Moringa seed extract), Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Olus Oil, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Tocopherol(Vitamine E), Lavandula Angustifolia Oil, Aniba Rosodora Wood Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Oil(Patchouli oil), Coco-Caprylate/Caprate(Coconut-derived emollient), Limonene(Ingredient in Bergamot oil), Linalool(Ingredient in Bergamot oil), Citral(Ingredient in Bergamot oil), Benzyl Benzoate(Ingredient in Ylang ylang oil), Geraniol(Ingredient in Rosewood oil)

description:
Description

-A plant-derived 99.2% scalp tonic to refresh itchy and oily scalp. It resolves the problem of excessive sebum of oily scalp and unpleasant feeling of scalp.
-Excessive heat on the scalp, which caused by overwork, drinking, stress, or smoking, can open pores and weaken hair roots. Excess sebum and oil also make your scalp smelly or sensitively.It's an right solution to deal with a smelly scalp and heated scalp to control sebum production on scalp, making your scalp fresh and clean. 

Suggested Use

Spray closely to the scalp so it covers all parts. Spray evenly all over the scalp and message gently with your fingertips or Wooden Scalp Brush. 
*Before using, combine spray with container. 
Key Ingredients

Alcohol(Grain fermentation alcohol), Lavandula Angustifolia Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Extract(9.13%), Mentha Haplocalix Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Aqua, *Mentha Piperita Oil（450mg）, *Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Oil, Panthenol(Vitamin B5), Biotin(Vitamin B7), Thiamine HCl(Vitamin B1 derivatives), Pyridoxine HCl(Vitamin B6 derivatives), Ascorbic Acid(Vitamin C), Menadione(Vitamin K3), Riboflavin(Vitamin B2), Salicylic Acid(Exfoliation (BHA)), Menthol(Skin refreshing agent), Bifida Ferment Lysate(Fermented moisturizer), Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate(Fermented moisturizer), Caffeine(Antioxidant), *Eugenol(Ingredient in Mentha Piperita Oil), *Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil, Glycerin(Plant-derived moisturizer), *Limonene(Ingredient in Mentha Piperita Oil), *Linalool(Ingredient in Mentha Piperita Oil), Ethylhexylglycerin(Emollient), 1,2-Hexanediol(Emollient) *Naturally found in essential oil(s).

product_name: *renewal* Cica Peptide Anti Hair Loss Derma Scalp Tonic 150ml
description:
Description

-Promotes healthier scalp and hydration.
-Menthol ingredient provides a cool cooling feeling to scalp heat, which is the cause of hair loss, helping to prevent hair loss.
-CICA which are 4 types of Titrated Extracts of Centella Asiatica helps calm down the scalp that is being stressed-out by the external stimulus.
-Provides the deep hydration and nourishment to the scalp effectively.
-It is sprayed like a mist and has a fresh finish without stickiness, so you can use it anytime, every day.

Suggested Use

1. Shake the product sufficiently before use. 
2. Spread the tonic on the scalp while dividing the sections with your fingers. 
3. Rub your fingertips like a massage to absorb.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.content: Scalp Cooling & Nourishing Tonic – My Experience This scalp tonic has been a lifesaver for my stressed-out scalp! It’s packed with menthol for an instant cooling effect — perfect for calming scalp heat, a known trigger for hair loss. The CICA (Centella Asiatica extracts) is amazing for soothing irritation and bringing balance back to my scalp. What I love most is how easy it is to use: just shake, spritz like a mist, and massage in. It’s super lightweight and non-sticky, leaving my scalp feeling fresh, hydrated, and nourished every day. A must-have for daily scalp care!

product_name: Milky Piggy Collagen Coating Protein Ion Injection 50ml
description:
Description


Inject full nutrients into your hair with ELIZAVECCA CER 100 Collagen Coating Protein Ion Injection. It is a hair essence that transforms damaged, split hair to soft silky hair. Containing collagen, keratin and various botanical ingredients, it prevents hair damage and nourishes your hair. 

● It is a hair essence that transforms damaged, split hair to soft silky hair
● Containing collagen, keratin and various botanical ingredients, it prevents hair damage and nourishes your hair
● Dry hair treatment and great on split ends


Suggested Use

1. After washing your hair, remove any excess water.
2. Apply the product to the your hair whilst avoiding the scalp. Pay particular attention to the ends.

3. Wait 3~5 mins to allow the nutrients in the treatment to be absorbed. Following this, gently rinse.


Ingredients


Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Chlorphenesin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caramel, PEG-14M, Butylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Silk, Alcohol, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Polyacrylate-13, Gelatin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Polyisobutene, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Polysorbate 20, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Extract, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit/Leaf/Stem, Brassica Oleracea apitata (Cabbage) Leaf Extract, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Brassica Oleracea Capitata (Cabbage) Leaf Extract, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol
